title: pankajAkSanAm
sahitya:
pankajAkSamAm  ramEshaning-anananta vAhanE vANIDum vishESamindu hanta colvadinganE


caraNam 1    bhaktalOka mAshu mOdabASpavAri tUkiyum pAda pankajam namiccu prItipUNDu mAevyum
    caraNam 2    shvEta kAnti shErnna chatra cAmarangaLagavE sEvakaukha mangaeDuttmAdarENa cAlavE
    caraNam 3    mandahAsa veNNIlAvu koNdu vishvamanjasA nandippiccu mattalAgavE hariccu bhUyasA
    caraNam 4    bhAnu kiranamEtru mEvu majanAdri pOl param bhavyamAya pIta vAsasA vasiccumurutaram
    caraNam 5    padmanAbha pAhi pAhi ennu lOka sancayam paricinODuraccu-mAdarAdapEda samshayam
